entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -42.6°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
